summary: Comprehensive end-to-end testing completed for KEESO institutional website. All backend APIs (17/17) passed successfully. Frontend testing shows excellent functionality across all pages with proper navigation, forms, and admin panel. Mobile responsiveness verified.

backend_issues.notes: All backend endpoints working perfectly. No issues found.

design_issues.issue: Tab buttons (Oda Hakkında, Misyon & Vizyon, Yönetim Kurulu, Mevzuat) not found via selector, but content is visible on page
design_issues.note: Content is displayed correctly, tabs may be implemented differently than expected

frontend_issues.notes: All forms, navigation, and interactions working correctly. No critical issues found.

passed_tests: Navigation to all pages (Kurumsal, Üyelik, Hizmetler, Duyurular, Ziyaretler, Ödeme, İletişim)
Duyurular page with search and category filter
Üyelik page - all 3 tabs (Şartlar, Başvuru, Sorgula)
Membership application form submission with file upload
Hizmetler page with services and document center
Footer with contact info and links
